Description: [Key:LLPARTY_Description:Expands the party size to 6 by default. This can be increased/decreased at will via the settings menu, allowing you to have up to 10 party members at once. If the extender is enabled, the lobby will work with more than 4 players, allowing 5+ players in character creation (EXPERIMENTAL).]

Entries.Text: See the full changelog in the 'Change Notes' tab on the Steam Workshop page.

Changes: Added a workaround for the intro scene in the Tutorial, which was hardcoded to 4 players. This fix will ensure the party doesn't remain 'frozen'.
